exceptions.tactic: apply Riemann_sum_norm with (g0 := fun t => g t - f t).
exceptions.exn: The reference g was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hfg was not found in the current environment.

original: intros Hps Hfg. apply Riemann_sum_norm with (g0 := fun t => g t - f t). - auto. - intros t Ht. specialize (Hfg t Ht). apply Rle_trans with (0 := norm_ge_0 _). rewrite <- Rle_sub_0. apply Rle_trans with (f t) ; auto.
